frontmatter.title: Use IP Allowlists (Whitelists) on Firewalls and block all other connections by default.
frontmatter.description: Consider adding whitelists to your firewalls to block all unknown or known malicious IP addresses automatically. However, be weary that whitelists are an uphill struggle - you will continuously have to add new addresses, you may prefer a blacklist instead.

frontmatter.title: Prevent access to the administrative interface from the Internet, unless there is a clear and documented business need.
